section.title: Removing an Administrator or User Role from a Resource
section.para: Remove an administrator or user role from a resource; the user loses the inherited permissions associated with the role for that resource.

procedure.title: Removing a Role from a Resource

step.para: Use the resource tabs, tree mode, or the search function to find and select the resource in the results list.
Click the Permissions tab in the details pane to list the assigned users, the user's role, and the inherited permissions for the selected resource.
Select the user to remove from the resource.
Click Remove. The Remove Permission window opens to confirm permissions removal.

section.para: You have removed the user's role, and the associated permissions, from the resource.
